lead_paragraph: Fund managers find ways to manage the risks inherent in this volatile sector and maximize the benefits.

headline.print_headline: Where Nerves of Steel Make All the Difference
headline.main: Small-Cap Growth Funds: For Investors With Nerves of Steel

snippet: Fund managers find ways to manage the risks inherent in this volatile sector and maximize the benefits.
abstract: Managers of small-cap growth funds predict sector will continue to be volatile, requiring investors to be patient and have high tolerance for risk; say timing and finding companies with competitive advantages is key.
